text: Madelin is a surname and given name. Notable people with the surname include: == Given name == * Madelin Coit, American multi-media artist *Madelin Riera (born 1989), Ecuadorian professional footballer == Surname == *Alain Madelin (born 1946), French politician *Louis Madelin (1871–1956), French historian *Michael Francis Madelin (1931–2007), British mycologist Category:Surnames Category:Given names
